title: Pregnant Casey Batchelor shows off her baby bump in floral bikini
text:
She's maintained her daily yoga sessions throughout her pregnancy with her second child.

And Casey Batchelor was filming new workout sessions for her exercise programme, Yoga Blitz, on the beach this week during a trip to Dubai.

Proving yoga is accessible for everyone, the 34-year-old star was seen doing her best Downward-Facing Dog and Sun Salutation despite being six months pregnant.

Staying healthy: Casey Batchelor was filming new workout sessions for her exercise programme, Yoga Blitz, on the beach this week during a trip to Dubai

Casey displayed her baby bump in a floral bikini featuring a red, white and orange print.

The two-piece boasted a sporty top and matching briefs with tie detailing on the hips.

The former Celebrity Big Brother star, who was joined on the trip by her fiancé Dane Goodson and their daughter Florence, 17 months, showcased her incredible flexibility as she performed the splits.

Showing off her moves: Proving yoga is accessible for everyone, the 34-year-old star was seen going through the flow

Vibrant swimwear: Casey displayed her baby bump in a floral bikini featuring a red, white and orange print

Working out: The former Celebrity Big Brother star showcased her incredible flexibility

Family holiday: Casey was joined on the trip by her fiancé Dane Goodson and their daughter Florence, 17 months

The former glamour model thinks it will be 'nice' for her girls to be close in age.

Casey recently told The Sun: 'It's a girl. Yeah, I'm having another girl which is so lovely because I never had a sister, I had two older brothers and they always had each other. So it will be nice for Florence to have a little sister.'

The news the couple are expecting a girl came as a surprise to Casey, who had been convinced by friends and family that she would have a boy.

Taking time out: Casey ensures she never misses her daily yoga session

Mother-to-be: Casey is shortly set to welcome her second child, a baby girl

The glamour model admitted she and Dane will continue trying for a son once their little girl has been born in early 2020.

She said: 'I was adamant I was having a boy, everyone convinced me. [They said] 'You’re carrying differently, and you’re all at the front, with a girl it’s at the back.'

'Dane's so happy that he’s having a little girl, but he would like a little boy obviously. If we had a boy this time, we would have the choice if we wanted to go again, but because we’re having a girl we’ll definitely try again.'

Expanding family: The glamour model admitted she and Dane will continue trying for a son once their little girl has been born in early 2020

Sun Salutation: Casey proved being pregnant didn't hinder her yoga moves

Casual swimwear: Her two-piece boasted a sporty top and matching briefs with tie detailing on the hips

Downward-Facing Dog: Casey didn't let her baby bump get in the way of her flow

Casey announced the couple were expecting their second child in Closer magazine, saying: 'I'm going to have two babies 20 months apart… I can' t quite believe it!

'It’ll be tough, but I’m going to ride the storm – we’re just so thrilled we’re having another baby!

'Dane and I wanted more children – we’re both turning 35 and we got engaged in January, so we didn’t want to wait much longer, as time is ticking on.

'We decided to start trying, and I got pregnant straight away. I do feel very lucky.'

Discussing her pregnancy, she said: 'We decided to start trying, and I got pregnant straight away. I do feel very lucky'

Casey explained: 'Dane and I wanted more children – we’re both turning 35 and we got engaged in January, so we didn’t want to wait much longer'

Incredible: The model and reality star made doing the splits look effortless
description: Casey Batchelor was filming new workout sessions for her exercise programme, Yoga Blitz, on the beach this week during a trip to Dubai.
